trans-unit.source: Specify the role group where you would like new groups to be created. This should be the same role group you have select for your main groups list.
trans-unit.target: Specify the role group where you would like new groups to be created. This should be the same role group you have select for your main groups list.

trans-unit.source: Select the page where users will view the list of groups.
trans-unit.target: Select the page where users will view the list of groups.

trans-unit.source: Check this box if groups require Administrator approval before they are visible.
trans-unit.target: Check this box if groups require Administrator approval before they are visible.

trans-unit.source: Select the page where users will go to view a particular group.
trans-unit.target: Select the page where users will go to view a particular group.
